title: Clinical Psychologist Shares the Science Behind Behavior Change
description: Dr. Joy Lere discusses how the mind works, how our beliefs are formed, and the tools and techniques we can use to guide positive behavior change for our clients.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Dr. Joy Lere discusses how the mind works, how our beliefs are formed, and the tools and techniques we can use to guide positive behavior change for our clients.
